text: KREP (92.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Belleville, Kansas. The station is owned by First Republic Broadcasting Corporation, and airs a country music format. The station was assigned the KREP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on December 27, 1983. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * FCC Public Inspection File for KREP * REP Category:Radio stations established in 1984 Category:1984 establishments in Kansas Category:Country radio stations in the United States Category:Republic County, Kansas
title: KREP
